item.title: Ancient autocast
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

For a start.

if(autoancient == 6)//

You haven’t like… Show’d where it keeps ++’ ing, if you get me…

You should have like…

//Anything
autoancient = 6;

or, autoancient++;

But, it wont work, that will only make it do once. You need some sort of loop.

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient autocast
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

I’ve tryed to add ancient auto cast

I used this

public void autoancient()
{ 
if(autoancient == 0)//none
{
playerSE = 809;
playerSEA = 406;
playerSEW = 1146;
playerSER = 1210;
}
if(autoancient == 1)//blood burst
{
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(376, 20, 3);
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1979); 
}
if(autoancient == 2)//ice burst
{   
inCombat(); 
attackPlayersWithin(363, 22, 3); 
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1979); 
}
if(autoancient == 3)//blood blitz
{
inCombat(); 
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1978); 
}
if(autoancient == 4)//ice blitz
{
inCombat(); 
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1978); 
}
if(autoancient == 5)//blood barrage
{
inCombat(); 
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1979); 
}
if(autoancient == 6)//ice barrage
{
inCombat(); 
actionTimer = 5; 
setAnimation(1979); 
}
}

and under Ancient staff

if (wearID == 4675) { // Ancient staff
autoancient();
}

Still doesn’t work…what i did wrong?

Read full topic
